import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { datas: any; constructor(private service: DataService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getdetails().subscribe((data) => { this.datas = data; console.log(typeof this.datas); }) } getdet(id) { const result = this.datas.find(o => o.Id == id); console.log(result); } onSubmit(){ } }
